data_dictionary.name: CaseId
data_dictionary.description: Case ID

data_dictionary.name: WEIGHT
data_dictionary.description: Post-stratification weights - 18+ general population (N=1,161)

data_dictionary.name: FluVax
data_dictionary.description: Have you or do you plan to get a flu vaccine for the 2020-2021 flu season?

encodings.1: Yes, I already got the vaccine for the 2020-2021 flu season
encodings.2: Yes, I plan to get the vaccine for the 2020-2021 flu season
encodings.4: No, I never get the flu vaccine

data_dictionary.name: FluVax_Employ
data_dictionary.description: Are you now required to get a flu vaccination as part of your employment?

data_dictionary.name: VaxPlans
data_dictionary.description: Now that a vaccine against the coronavirus is becoming available, do you plan to get vaccinated, or not?

encodings.2: Yes, I will get a coronavirus vaccine as soon as it is available to me
encodings.3: Yes, I will get a coronavirus vaccine, but I will wait until I see more proof that it is safe and effective
encodings.4: No, I will not get a coronavirus vaccine

data_dictionary.name: Vax_ProtectFam
data_dictionary.description: [I want to protect my family] Which of the following are reasons you [got/would get] a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [I want to protect my community] Which of the following are reasons you [got/would get] a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [ I want to protect myself] Which of the following are reasons you [got/would get] a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [I don’t like needles] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [I’m not concerned about getting seriously ill from the coronavirus] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [I won’t have time to get vaccinated] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [I don’t think vaccines work very well] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [Politicians might promote a vaccine to win votes even if it is not fully tested or safe] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [The coronavirus outbreak is not as serious as some people say it is] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [I don’t think the majority of the public will get the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: [There is nothing that would make me get the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine [sooner]?

data_dictionary.name: Change_DocCall
data_dictionary.description: If a doctor you know called you directly to talk about your concerns around the COVID-19 vaccine, would that change your mind on getting a COVID-19 vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_HealthDept
data_dictionary.description: If your local health department called you directly to talk about your concerns around the COVID-19 vaccine would that change your mind on getting a COVID-19 vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: GiftCard
data_dictionary.description: If you were offered a gift card for $50 would that make you more likely to want to get a COVID-19 vaccine?

encodings.1: Yes, but I would also get it without the gift card
encodings.2: Yes, I would try to get the vaccine sooner
encodings.3: No, because I don't want to get it under any circumstances

data_dictionary.name: GiftCard_OE
data_dictionary.description: [NUMBERBOX] What is the lowest amount that would be necessary to make a difference in your decision to get a COVID-19 vaccine?

data_dictionary.description: Do you expect that you will be required to get a COVID-19 vaccination as part of your employment?

data_dictionary.name: ChanceCovid
data_dictionary.description: Considering the next three months, on a scale of 0 to 100 percent, do you think there is a 0% chance you will get the coronavirus or 100% chance you will get the coronavirus?

data_dictionary.name: DeathCovid
data_dictionary.description: If you do get the coronavirus, on a scale of 0 to 100 percent, do you think there is a 0% chance you will die from it or 100% chance you will die from it?

data_dictionary.name: Personal_COVIDtest
data_dictionary.description: Have you been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)? If so, what was the result?

encodings.1: Yes, I have tested positive at least once for COVID-19
encodings.2: Yes, I have never tested positive for COVID-19
encodings.3: Yes, but I do not know the result(s)
encodings.4: No, I have never been tested, but I experienced COVID-19 symptoms
encodings.5: No, I have never been tested and I have not had symptoms of COVID-19

data_dictionary.name: HH_TestPositive
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has been tested and he/she tested positive (They had coronavirus)] Has any family member, close friend, or other person living in your home (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_TestNegative
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has been tested and he/she never tested positive...] Has any family member, close friend, or other person living in your home (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_TestUnknown
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has been tested and I do not know the result] Has any family member, close friend, or other person living in your home (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_COVIDSymptoms
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has not been tested, but he/she experienced COVID-19 symptoms] Has any family member, close friend, or other person living in your home (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_NoCOVID
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has not been tested and he/she has not experienced COVID-19 symptoms] Has any family member, close friend, or other person living in your home (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_NoMembers

data_dictionary.name: HH_REF
data_dictionary.description: [REFUSED] Has any family member, close friend, or other person living in your home (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: EssentialJob
data_dictionary.description: Thinking about your main job in the past month, would that job be considered “essential” in your state?

encodings.3: Not working in the past month

data_dictionary.name: WashHands
data_dictionary.description: [Washed/sanitized hands more than usual] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic (in addition to what you normally do)?

encodings.1: No, I don't think it is necessary
encodings.2: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: AvoidTransit
data_dictionary.description: [Avoided public transportation (e.g., bus, subway, train, commuter rail)] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic (in addition to what you normally do)?

encodings.1: No, I don't think it is necessary
encodings.2: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: LessGroups10
data_dictionary.description: [Limited interactions with others to groups of 10 or less] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic (in addition to what you normally do)?

encodings.2: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: SixFeet
data_dictionary.description: [Kept a 6-foot radius when interacting with people you do not live with] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic (in addition to what you normally do)?

encodings.1: No, I don't think it is necessary
encodings.2: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: RACE_WhiteAdvantage
data_dictionary.description: [White people in the U.S. have certain advantages because of the color of their skin.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Successful
data_dictionary.description: [Race is very important in determining who is successful and who is not.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Prison
data_dictionary.description: [Race plays an important role in who gets sent to prison.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.description: [Race plays a major role in the type of social services (such as type of health care or day care) that people receive in the U.S.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Opportunity
data_dictionary.description: [Racial and ethnic minorities do not have the same opportunities as white people in the U.S.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.description: [Racial and ethnic minorities in the U.S. have certain advantages because of the color of their skin.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Rich
data_dictionary.description: [Everyone who works hard, no matter what race they are, has an equal chance to become rich.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.description: [White people are more to blame for racial discrimination than racial and ethnic minorities.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_A_Medicaid
data_dictionary.description: [I favor expanding Medicaid insurance benefits for low income families to provide coverage for treatment...prescription pain medications] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_B_Naloxone
data_dictionary.description: [I favor making naloxone (also known as “Narcan”),...available and affordable without a prescription] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_C_Mandatory
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that making drug treatment mandatory is an effective way to help people with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_D_GovSpend
data_dictionary.description: [I favor increasing government spending to improve treatment of opioid use disorder/addiction] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_A_HistoryWork
data_dictionary.description: [I would be willing to have a person with a past history of opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_C_CurrentWork
data_dictionary.description: [I would be willing to have a person with a current opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_D_CurrentMarry
data_dictionary.description: [I would be comfortable having a person with a current opioid use disorder marry into my close or immediate family.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_B_HistoryMarry
data_dictionary.description: [I am comfortable having a person with a past history of opioid use disorder marry into my close or immediate family.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_E_Dangerous
data_dictionary.description: [People with a current opioid use disorder are more dangerous than the general population.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_F_Trust
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder cannot be trusted.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_CurrentSteal
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder would be willing to steal money or valuable items in order to get drugs.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_HistorySteal
data_dictionary.description: [A person who has a past history of opioid use disorder...valuable items out of desperation to get drugs.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_CurrentHighRisk
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder...make them a high-risk employee in my workplace.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_HistoryHighRisk
data_dictionary.description: [A person who has a past history of opioid use disorder...make them a high-risk employee in my workplace.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?
